'''Rawat's Private Laboratory''' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|Underground Crime}}.

==Trial Character==
{{Transclude|Underground Crime|Trial Character}}

==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
# Reach the marked location
# Defeat opponents
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Raptor; Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist; Recon Log Mek - Pneuma*2}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Crusher; Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer; Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer; Recon Log Mek - Pneuma*2}}
#* An [[Exquisite Chest]] will unlock after defeating opponents.
# Enter the next room and go through the ventilation shaft, then proceed to the large room
# Proceed to the next room and approach the gate
# Go right and enter the cart area
# Solve the cart puzzle
#* Rotate the track clockwise once and move the cart. Next, rotate the track counterclockwise and move the cart again. Follow the cart.
# Climb the ladder to the right and defeat the opponents
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Large Pyro Slime; Pyro Slime*3}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy|Large Pyro Slime|x=3}}
#* A [[Common Chest]] will unlock after defeating opponents.
# Solve the cart puzzle
#* First, ignore the first cart and instead move the empty cart that is closest to the gate. Rotate the track counterclockwise and move the cart into a dead end. After moving the cart, rotate the track clockwise twice to connect it to the middle track. Next, go back and move the first cart, rotate the track clockwise, and move the cart again to get it onto the next track. Rotate the track counterclockwise and move the cart to the gate.
# Go left and enter the lab
# Open the large door
#* A [[Common Chest]] can be found opposite the door, by a window.
# Head to the next room
#* The large door leading back will close on the way.
# Defeat the fugitives
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Crusher; Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist; Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer; Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer; Recon Log Mek - Pneuma*2}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Assault Specialist Mek - Pneuma; Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer; Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer*2; Recon Log Mek - Pneuma*2}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Assault Specialist Mek - Pneuma; Suppression Specialist Mek - Pneuma}}
# Exit the Domain
#* A [[Precious Chest]] can be found by the exit.
